item.description:
After sailing on the Charles, we'll have Dim Sum for lunch at China Pearl. Feel free to join us even if you aren't sailing. All are welcome.

As always, please remember to update your RSVP if your plans change.
item.how_to_find_us: We will make reservations. A cell # will be given if you need to call or text.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dim Sum
